name: Interstellar Smackdown 3
description:
Interstellar Smackdown 3 is a local co-op game, where you must work together in order to bring down Earth's colonising mothership.

Created in a short internal weekend game jam, the game focuses on the theme of destruction. Two players control a lurking spaceship that must destroy the mothership through grappling and hurling planets at it. Players must communicate to control the three different spaceship systems: movement, shooting, and grappling.

Dual Xbox controllers supported (only).
